name: debauch
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to destroy or damage something so that it is no longer considered good or moral: Lenin said that the best way to destroy the capitalist system was to debauch the currency. Synonyms
corrupt
deprave formal
pervert disapproving
vitiate formal
